Discharge from clinic or hospital is permissible 6 hours after delivery provided that: 
• The discharge check list in the Maternity Case Record is completed and there are no medical, surgical or
obstetric problems that require attention
• the mother looks and feels well
• the mother has a safe place to stay
• there is no evidence of anaemia
• the heart rate (< 100/min), respiratory rate (< 20/minute) temperature (< 37.5 °C) and the blood pressure are
all normal
